import { Component } from "@angular/core"; import * as data from 'src/assets/data/data.json'; @Component({ selector: 'app-popular-movies', templateUrl: './popular-movies.component.html', styleUrls: ['./popular-movies.component.scss'] }) export class PopularMoviesComponent { films: any = (data as any).default; }

'мультфильм, ' :genre == 8 ? 'комедия, ' : genre == 9 ? 'триллер, ' :genre == 10 ? 'детектив, ' : genre == 11 ? 'фантастика, ' : ''}} военный
